guidelines.title: Guidelines, Rules & Standards
guidelines.subtitle: Platform policies and best practices for all users

toolSubmission.title: Tool Submission Guidelines
toolSubmission.desc: Standards for submitting AI tools to our directory.
toolSubmission.rule1: Provide accurate and complete information about the tool.
toolSubmission.rule2: Include working website links and up-to-date pricing information.
toolSubmission.rule3: Use appropriate categories and tags for better discoverability.
toolSubmission.rule4: Do not submit duplicate tools or spam submissions.

articles.title: Article Writing Guidelines
articles.rule1: Write original, well-researched content with proper citations.
articles.rule2: Use clear, professional language and proper formatting.
articles.rule3: Include relevant images and media to enhance your content.
articles.rule4: Do not plagiarize or publish misleading information.

community.title: Community Behavior
community.desc: Expected conduct when interacting with others.
community.rule1: Be respectful and constructive in all interactions.
community.rule2: Provide helpful feedback and support to fellow creators.
community.rule3: Do not engage in harassment, trolling, or personal attacks.
community.rule4: Do not spam or self-promote excessively.

jobPosting.title: Job Posting Guidelines
jobPosting.rule1: Provide accurate job descriptions with clear requirements.
jobPosting.rule2: Include transparent salary ranges and benefits information.
jobPosting.rule3: Specify work location, remote options, and job type clearly.
jobPosting.rule4: Do not post fake jobs or misleading opportunities.

talentEngagement.title: Talent Engagement Rules
talentEngagement.desc: How to interact with potential candidates.
talentEngagement.rule1: Respect candidates' time and respond to applications promptly.
talentEngagement.rule2: Provide constructive feedback when declining candidates.
talentEngagement.rule3: Do not contact candidates for positions they haven't applied for without consent.

communication.title: Communication Standards
communication.rule1: Maintain professional and respectful communication at all times.
communication.rule2: Respond to candidate inquiries within a reasonable timeframe.
communication.rule3: Keep all candidate information confidential and secure.

terms.title: Terms of Service Summary
terms.desc: Key points from our terms of service.
terms.rule1: You must be at least 18 years old to use this platform.
terms.rule2: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account.
terms.rule3: Content you post remains your property but you grant us license to display it.

prohibited.title: Prohibited Content & Behavior
prohibited.desc: Content and actions that are not allowed on our platform.
prohibited.rule1: Hate speech, discrimination, or content promoting violence.
prohibited.rule2: Spam, phishing, or malicious links and content.
prohibited.rule4: Copyright infringement or unauthorized use of intellectual property.
prohibited.rule5: Adult content, illegal activities, or harmful material.

privacy.title: Privacy & Data Protection
privacy.desc: How we handle your data and privacy.
privacy.rule1: We collect only necessary data to provide our services.
privacy.rule2: Your data is encrypted and stored securely.
privacy.rule3: You can request deletion of your data at any time.

consequences.title: Violation Consequences
consequences.desc: What happens when rules are violated.
consequences.item1: First violation: Warning and content removal
consequences.item4: Severe or repeated violations: Permanent account termination
